data.instruction: Create an offer representing the UC primary service; choose execution mode matching the scenario.
data.expectedResult: Offer is created in draft state with captured id.

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Hold card but don't charge until approved". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

requestBody.title: Customer one books primary offer API Trace

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Runs consolidated vs per-location reports". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Insurance Eligibility Re-Check. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Create a primary location for the biz and set timezone aligned with scenario context.
data.expectedResult: Location exists and is associated with the new biz.
